definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Emigrants are often pining for home within weeks of arriving in their new country.
sentences.chinese: 移民在到了新国家的头几个星期里，常常思恋故土。

sentences.english: The forest homeland of the Penan is full of food for them.
sentences.chinese: 他们的丛林故土充满了所需要的食物。

sentences.english: When spring comes, they take wing for the Arctic.
sentences.chinese: 春天来临时它们振翅飞向北极的故土。

sentences.english: Longitudinal trail far-off regions ethereal, go native heart mirror.
sentences.chinese: 海角天涯纵踪迹缥缈，魂归故土心可鉴。

sentences.english: The red land with thousand of heroes sleeping in.
sentences.chinese: 红色故土长眠千万壮士英豪。

sentences.english: Is only, she in native land and outside areas free shuttle intercourse not any alone.
sentences.chinese: 只是，她在故土和外地自由穿梭往来没有任何孤寂。

sentences.english: To choose foreignness is an act of disloyalty to one's native country.
sentences.chinese: 选择客居，可以说是一种对故土的不忠行为。

sentences.english: And their memory is only the shadow of a cloud moving across the prairie.
sentences.chinese: 当故土只剩下碧草地，白云飘的回忆。

sentences.english: Mummy of Egypt's monotheist pharaoh to return home .
sentences.chinese: 埃及一神论法老木乃伊即将返回故土。

sentences.english: He is too root-bound to consider moving to another state.
sentences.chinese: 他太依恋故土，从未考虑过要搬迁到别的州去。

sentences.english: Wenzhou is the hometown of Nanxi Opera or the Southern Opera.
sentences.chinese: 温州是南戏或南戏的故土。

sentences.english: From that day were driven out of their native land, there will be no Jews had forgotten to return to hometown.
sentences.chinese: 从被逐出故土那天起，犹太人就没有忘记过重返故园。

definition: to miss/to long for/to remember with longing/yearning
foreign land/a place far from home
person living or traveling far from home
a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom); everything has its ancestral home/In old age, an expatriate longs to return home.
to leave one's native place, esp. against one's will (idiom)
Getting Home, 2007 PRC comedy-drama film directed by 張揚|张扬[Zhang1 Yang2], starring 趙本山|赵本山[Zhao4 Ben3 shan1]
lit. a falling leaf returns to the roots (idiom)/fig. all things go back to their source eventually/in old age, an expatriate returns home
to drift (in the tide)/to rove/to lead a wandering existence/drifter/wanderer
foreign land/away from one's native place
